doc:
Christopher Kromer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_Kromer 0 Christopher Edward "Chris" Kromer (born August 1, 1973) is an American actor, voice actor, television host, real estate agent, former financial consultant and pianist. He is co-host of the reality series Beat the House on HGTV. Christopher_Edward_"_Chris_"_Kromer ( born August_1_,_1973 ) is an_American_actor , voice_actor , television_host , real_estate_agent , former_financial_consultant_and_pianist . He is_co-host of the_reality_series_Beat the_House on HGTV .
